content: january morning socks by kate henry version 2 2 1 materials main color mc - sock yarn 100 grams 300 yards contrast color cc - sock yarn 20 grams 75 yards us 1 2 25 mm needles - dpns 9 inch circular or magic loop tapestry needle stitch markers abbreviations bor - beginning of round cc - contrast color co - cast on k- knit k2tog - knit two stitches together mc - main color p - purl p2tog - purl two stitches together pm - place marker rs - right side sl - slip_stitch purlwise with yarn in back sm - slip marker ssk - slip slip knit slip two stitches knitwise transfer back to the left hand needle and knit 2 together ws - wrong side sizes & gauge pattern is written as sizes small medium large circumference 8-9 9-10 10-11 gauge is 26 stitches and 36 row over 4 2 cuff using cc co 56 64 72 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches pm rounds 1-10 *k1 p1* repeat till end of round break cc leg join mc round 1 knit all stitches round 2 knit all stitches round 3 *k1 p1* repeat till end of round round 4 knit all stitches repeat rounds 1-4 twelve 12 times or until you reach your desired leg length make sure to end on round 4 heel flap break mc join cc turn your work around so that you are knitting on the wrong side row 1 ws k3 purl 25 29 33 row 2 rs p3 *sl1 k1* repeat ** till last 3 stitches k3 row 3 ws k3 purl 25 29 33 row 4 rs p3 *k1 sl1* repeat ** till last 3 stitches k3 repeat row 1-4 6 7 8 more times repeat row 1 once more 3 heel turn row 1 rs sl1 k14 16 18 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p3 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 knit to 1t stitch before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1 purl to 1st stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until you have worked all of the stitches in your heel turn you will end with row 4 and have 16 18 20 stitches left break cc gusset join mc knit across the 16 18 20 stitches of the heel turn pick up 14 16 18 stitches along the side of the heel flap pick up 1 extra stitch in the ladder of the row below between the heel flap and the leg of the sock if you have removed your bor marker replace it here knit across the 28 32 36 instep stitches in pattern starting with round 1 pm pick up 1 extra stitch in the ladder of the row below between the heel flap and the leg of the sock pick up 14 16 18 stitches along the side of the heel flap knit to the bor marker you will now
